title: Classic Margherita Pizza
steps: Mix flour, yeast, and salt in a large bowl
Add warm water and olive oil, knead for 10 minutes
Let dough rise for 1 hour in a warm place
Roll out dough and add tomato sauce
Top with mozzarella and bake at 450°F for 15-20 minutes
Garnish with fresh basil before serving

title: Grilled Chicken Breast
steps: Preheat grill to medium-high heat
Season chicken with salt, pepper, and herbs
Brush with olive oil and minced garlic
Grill for 6-8 minutes per side
Let rest for 5 minutes before slicing
Serve with lemon wedges

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
steps: Preheat oven to 425°F and grease ramekins
Melt chocolate and butter together
Whisk eggs, yolks, and sugar until pale
Fold in melted chocolate mixture
Gently fold in flour and vanilla
Bake for 12-14 minutes until edges are set

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (broccoli, carrots, bell peppers)
steps: Heat oil in a wok or large pan over high heat
Add garlic and ginger, stir for 30 seconds
Add vegetables and stir fry for 5-7 minutes
Mix soy sauce, broth, and cornstarch
Pour sauce over vegetables and cook until thickened
Serve hot over rice or noodles

title: Beef Tacos
ingredients: Sour cream and salsa for serving
steps: Brown ground beef in a large skillet
Add taco seasoning and water, simmer for 5 minutes
Warm taco shells in oven or microwave
Fill shells with beef mixture
Top with vegetables and cheese
Serve with sour cream and salsa

title: Tiramisu
steps: Beat egg yolks and sugar until pale and thick
Fold in mascarpone cheese
Whip cream to stiff peaks and fold into mixture
Dip ladyfingers in coffee and layer in dish
Spread half the mascarpone mixture over cookies
Repeat layers and dust with cocoa powder
Refrigerate for at least 4 hours before serving

title: Quinoa Buddha Bowl
steps: Cook quinoa in vegetable broth according to package
Roast sweet potato cubes at 400°F for 20 minutes
Sauté kale in olive oil until wilted
Arrange quinoa, vegetables, and avocado in bowls
Drizzle with lemon juice and olive oil
Season with salt and pepper to taste

title: Salmon Teriyaki
steps: Preheat oven to 400°F
Mix teriyaki sauce, honey, garlic, and ginger
Place salmon in baking dish and pour sauce over
Bake for 15-18 minutes until flaky
Garnish with green onions and sesame seeds
Serve with steamed rice and vegetables

title: Apple Crumble
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F
Toss apples with sugar and cinnamon
Place apples in baking dish
Mix flour, brown sugar, and cold butter for crumble
Add oats and nuts to crumble mixture
Sprinkle crumble over apples and bake for 30 minutes

title: Mushroom Risotto
steps: Heat broth in a saucepan and keep warm
Sauté mushrooms in olive oil until golden
Cook onion and garlic in butter until soft
Add rice and stir for 2 minutes
Add wine and stir until absorbed
Gradually add broth, stirring constantly
Stir in parmesan cheese and serve
